Bird of Prey static display & flying show | owls and raptors Menu Home About Us Contact Us Care home visits Care home visits School Visits Nursery Visits Shopping Centres Mobile Zoo Owl Weddings UK 07729 768416 info@owl-adventures.co.uk Public Events February to November, 7 days a week Museum Gardens Display, York, North Yorkshire. 11am to 4pm with a varied selection of different birds of prey, ¬£4 to per hold (2 for ¬£6) or enjoy a flying experience for ¬£20. (The display is weather permitting, pre-booking a flying experience is not essential but is preferred). On certain days our magnificent Steppes Eagle, who boasts a 7 foot wingspan, can be seen on display. You can enjoy a handling experience with her for ¬£10. The price difference is in place to help control the amount of customer handling she does on any given day. 2 hour F lying¬†Experience An ideal gift idea (vouchers can be purchased and sent to to you) or a treat for yourself, our 2 hour experience includes handling a selection of different birds of prey before flying an owl and a Harris Hawk. The experience is presented by one of our experienced falconers and you can take as many photos and videos as you like. For more information, to make a booking or to buy a gift voucher, please call 07729 768416 Public Events Birds Of Prey Displays, Yorkshire, The North East & Cumbria Flying Shows Truly Unique and Memorable Flying Shows With over 13¬†years experience, our head Falconer, Ryan Stocks has delivered exciting birds of prey flying shows in Yorkshire at a number of high-profile events. Whether it has been at the RHS Garden Harlow Carr, the Yorkshire Balloon Fiesta or Ilkley carnival, Ryan understands how important it is to put on a spectacle. Ryan does this through changing the show every year so that the shows are always fresh and new for spectators who visit the attractions each year. Music, comedy and lots of audience participation mean that the flying shows are always memorable. It is important that the audience is rarely passive at these falconry shows. Ryan uses innovative methods to enrich the birds, whilst at the same entertaining the audience. Volunteers may get to hold one of the owls, or have one of the owls fly close to them. Naturally, this creates lots of laughter and fun. Ryan's expertise with over 50 different species such as the Harris Hawk, Eagle Owl, Barn Owl, Burrowing Owl, African Vulture, American Vulture and various other breeds, means that he is a source of great knowledge about the birds. Naturally, every bird of prey flying show in Yorkshire that Ryan provides is always safe, fun and full of fascinating facts. To make your gala, attraction or fair truly memorable, contact us for a discussion about our birds of prey shows in Yorkshire , The North East or Cumbria. We can easily access all surrounding counties such as Derbyshire, Lancashire, Lincolnshire and Durham. We can also travel to anywhere within mainland United Kingdom. Static Shows Stimulating Displays for Kids and Adults In addition to the shows, we can also offer static displays that are perfect for country shows, fairs and galas. Over the years we have attended many events including the Brighouse Victorian Christmas market, York Roman Festival and the Armed Forces Day in Wakefield. At these static displays, attendees can get a close up look of the birds as well as interact and hold the birds. Our helpful guides have worked with the falcons and birds for a number of years and can offer interesting insights as to how these amazing creatures fly, forage and survive in the wild. When we attend a fete, gala or event to create a static display, we bring a gazebo with the birds of prey. We have a range of birds at Owl Adventures, but we will always bring a small one, a medium one and a large one, so that children of all ages get to interact with the owls, falcons and eagles. Usually, we will also bring our exotic animal encounters collection to the event, so for any children not attracted or nervous about the birds, they can pick up a snake, spider or lizard instead. Prices No two events are the same and we want to provide you with unforgettable memories of our sessions. We'd love to provide a tailored package for your activity. Please¬†send us a message¬†and include your¬†location¬†and date preference, we can then ensure we provide you with the perfect display. For more information about our birds of prey displays in Yorkshire or Nationwide, please get in touch. Get In Touch Contact Us: Telephone 07729768416 Email Copyright 2025 - Owl Adventures Contact Us | Home Home About Us Contact Us Care home visits Care home visits School Visits Nursery Visits Shopping Centres Mobile Zoo Owl Weddings UK 07729768416 Mail us Name Email Telephone Subject Message Send Thank You Your Email has been sent

It has been created by Owl Adventures - Flying Displays and School Visits that will Excite and Educate Interactive & engaging shows with our static bird of prey display and flying demonstrations. Fully insured for events with professional handlers service and Birds of Prey shows
We hope that this webpage provides you with lots of useful information.

MHB‚Äôs Team have already been able to inspect all of our vacation homes. Aside from minor damages, which will be repaired within the next 10 days, all homes are in excellent condition. Power has been restored to all properties.  Our vacation homes are fully operational, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!  If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to us at any time. Current PHP version: 8.2.29 The Ultimate Guide to Cape Coral Events Come explore the amazing events happening in Cape Coral! This coastal city is known for its waterfront views, friendly locals, and amazing events year-round events to keep you entertained. This guide will walk you through the best events Cape Coral, FL has to offer for each month, ensuring you won‚Äôt miss out on any of the year-round fun. Grab your calendar, mark these events, and get ready to have the best time at these Cape Coral events ! January Cape Coral Arts & Music Festival Kick off the year with a dose of the arts and crafts at the Cape Coral Arts & Music Festival! This an annual event has been happening for over 40 years and is a delight to the community. Here you can find a variety of artwork, from fine art to handmade crafts. Held along the Cape Coral Parkway, this festival attracts artists and musicians from all over the country. Enjoy live performances, delicious food, and unique art pieces. Get your new year off to a creative and fun start! Event Website : https://capecoralartfestival.com/ Cape Coral Farmers Market Another must-visit in January is the Cape Coral Farmers Market. Open every Saturday from 8am ‚Äì 1pm, stop by this market for fresh produce, baked goods, handmade crafts, and more! Event Website : https://www.capecoralfarmersmarket.com February Burrowing Owl Festival Cape Coral is home to a significant population of burrowing owls, and the Burrowing Owl Festival celebrates them! Visit the largest wildlife festival in Southwest Florida to learn about the local wildlife, enjoy educational exhibits, and participate in guided nature walks! Event Website: https://ccfriendsofwildlife.org/programs/burrowing-owl-festival/ March Cape Coral Irish Festival Celebrate St. Patrick‚Äôs Day at the Cape Coral Irish Festival in March. This two-day event is packed with traditional Irish music, dance performances, and plenty of green! Bring the whole family and enjoy authentic Irish food, beer, and fun. It‚Äôs a great way to embrace Irish culture and community spirit. Event Website: https://www.capecoralirishamericanclub.org Taste of the Cape In March, foodies flock to Cape Coral for the Taste of the Cape event. This culinary extravaganza gathers the best local restaurants showcasing their delicious dishes. Enjoy mouth-watering cuisine, live music and family-friendly fun. Event Website: http://tasteofcapecoral.com Cardboard Boat Regatta The Cardboard Boat Regatta is a fun and unique Cape Coral event where participants build and race boats made entirely of cardboard. It‚Äôs a great family-friendly activity that encourages creativity and teamwork. Enjoy the races, food vendors, and live entertainment. Event Website: https://www.capecoralregatta.com Sounds of Jazz & Blues Festival Music lovers won‚Äôt want to miss the Cape Coral Jazz & Blues Festival held in March. Purchase your general or experience admission tickets in advance. Bring your lawn chair and blankets and come enjoy the show! Food and beverages are available for purchase. Listen to great music as March ushers in the spring weather. Event Website: https://www.capeconcerts.com/tickets May Cinco de Mayo Celebration Join the Cinco de Mayo celebration in Cape Coral, featuring Mexican cuisine, music, and dance. It‚Äôs a lively event that showcases Mexican culture and traditions, through parades and celebrations. June Father‚Äôs Day Fishing Tournament If dad is an angler, he won‚Äôt want to miss the Father‚Äôs Day fishing tournament! Spend time with dad out on the water as he works to reel in his next great catch! Compete for prizes, enjoy a day of fishing, and create lasting memories with loved ones. Event Website: https://www.capecoral.net July Mango Mania Celebrate the delicious mango bounty of Florida at Mango Mania! This fun-filled festival features mango tastings, cooking demonstrations, and mango games and contests. Discover different varieties of mangos, enjoy live music, and take home some delicious mango treats! Event Website : https://www.pineislandchamber.org/chamber-events/mangomania/ Summerfest at Fort Myers Brewing Co. Located just a 20-minute drive from Cape Coral is Fort Myers. Come escape the summer heat at Summerfest, an event presented by Fort Myers Brewing Co. Come enjoy more than 50 specialty beers, live music and food trucks! Bring your lawn chair and pets to enjoy the festivities. Event Website: fmbrew.com & the Fort Myers Brewing Company Facebook page Red, White, & Boom Get ready for the biggest Independence Day celebration in Southwest Florida. The festival features a spectacular fireworks display, live music, and food vendors. It‚Äôs a patriotic event you won‚Äôt want to miss. Event Website: https://www.capeboom.com August Suga Reggae Fest Come for island vibes and a celebration of reggae music and Caribbean culture at the Suga Reggae Fest. Groove to the beats of live reggae bands and enjoy delicious Caribbean cuisine. Experience a taste of Caribbean Island life at this music event. Event Website: http://sugafestconcert.com/calendar/suga-reggae-fest-ticket-information/ October Oktoberfest Join the German-American Social Club for their annual Oktoberfest celebration in September. This event features traditional German music, food, and beer. Enjoy bratwurst, pretzels, and schnitzel while listening to live polka bands. Play games for prizes and enjoy fun for the whole family, at this festive and cultural experience. Event Website: https://www.capecoraloktoberfest.com Cape Coral Bike Night Held on the second Saturday of the month, Cape Coral Bike Night the event for motorcycle lovers! Take a peek at the selection of unique cycles, listen to the live music and sample some good food at the vendors trucks and tents! Even if you don‚Äôt ride, Cape Coral Bike Night is still a great event to attend. Event Website: https://www.ccbikenight.com November Taste of the Islands Held on Sanibel Island, just a short drive from Cape Coral, Taste of the Islands is a fantastic culinary event featuring local restaurants. Try a variety of delicious dishes, enjoy live music, and bask in the beautiful island atmosphere. Event Website: https://www.tasteoftheislands.org Veterans Day Parade Honor the brave men and women who have served in the military at the Cape Coral Veterans Day Parade. This patriotic event features marching bands, floats, and a touching ceremony to pay tribute to veterans. It‚Äôs a meaningful way to show appreciation for their service. Event Website: https://www.capecoral.gov/department/parks_and_recreationhome/special_events/veterans_day_parade.php December Holiday Festival of Lights Ring in the holiday season with the Cape Coral Holiday Festival of Lights. Come on down for the tree lighting ceremony, holiday-themed performances, and a visit from Santa Claus himself! Stroll through the beautifully decorated streets, enjoy hot cocoa, and get into the festive spirit with your family and friends. Event Website : https://www.holidayfestivalcc.com/ Boat-a-Long Your eyes will sparkle as you check out the Boat-a-Long! At this festive event, boat owners decorate their vessels with festive lights and decorations. You can witness Santa and his elves spreading some good cheer all along the Bimini Basin. The boats then parade through the canals, creating a spectacular sparkling display. It‚Äôs a magical event that brings the community together Event Website : https://www.capecoral.gov/department/parks_and_recreationhome/special_events/holiday_boat-a-long.php Stay Central to Events in Cape Coral, FL and More with Cape Coral 4 Vacation When planning a trip to Cape Coral for any of these awesome Cape Coral events, you‚Äôll want to choose the right accommodations. Naturally, you‚Äôll want a place that‚Äôs clean, comfortable and central to all these events and much more. Instead of an average, boring hotel option ‚Äì go for a vacation rental as the home base for all your Cape Coral adventures! Cape Coral 4 Vacation has a large selection of vacation rentals that with amenities and features that make it the perfect choice for your visit. Transform your trip from ordinary to an extraordinary, and unforgettable getaway! Home Away from Home Imagine starting your day in a spacious, beautifully decorated vacation rental, where you can enjoy all the comforts of home. Unlike cramped hotel rooms, Cape Coral 4 Vacation properties offer plenty of space to relax and unwind. Whether you‚Äôre traveling with family, friends, or on a solo adventure, you‚Äôll find the perfect rental that caters to your needs. Spread out and make yourself at home in a vacation rental that has a full kitchen, cozy living area, and multiple bedrooms. Gather for movies and games in the living area. Feel the warm balmy breezes from your patio or deck. Get the rest you need in a cozy bedroom with plush bedding. Seek out moments of self-care in a spa-like bathroom with high-end finishes. Your Cape Coral 4 Vacation rental has everything you need and more to fully enjoy your time here. Prime Locations Cape Coral 4 Vacation rentals are strategically located throughout the city, ensuring you‚Äôre never far from the action. Whether you‚Äôre attending the Cape Coral Arts & Music Festival, Taste of the Cape, or the Red, White, & Boom celebration, there‚Äôs a property nearby that offers easy access to your event. Save time while being immersed in the local Cape Coral culture when you stay in a vacation rental from Cape Coral 4 Vacation. Private Amenities One of the standout benefits of choosing a vacation rental is access to private amenities. Many Cape Coral 4 Vacation properties feature private pools, hot tubs, and waterfront views. Spend moments of downtime between events lounging by your own pool. Sip a refreshing drink and soak up that sweet Florida sunshine! After a day at the events, come home to your vacation rental and enjoy a relaxing soak in the hot tub, or a late-night swim. Rise each morning of your stay to a spectacular view that can‚Äôt be beat. These exclusive amenities from your Cape Coral 4 Vacation rental give you a level of luxury and privacy that hotels simply can‚Äôt compete with. Personalized Experience When you book with Cape Coral 4 Vacation, you‚Äôre not just getting a place to stay; you‚Äôre getting a personalized experience. The team wants to make sure that you have a comfortable and relaxing stay. If you are unsure about which rental to choose or are in need of some further assistance during the booking process ‚Äì Cape Coral 4 Vacation will go above and beyond to make you feel welcome and satisfied. This personalized touch makes all the difference in creating a memorable vacation. Cost-Effective Vacation rentals can also be a cost-effective option, especially for larger groups. Splitting the cost of a vacation rental among several people often results in significant savings compared to booking multiple hotel rooms! Also, your Cape Coral 4 Vacation rental has a full kitchen where you can prepare delicious meals at home, saving money on dining out. We‚Äôre not saying that you shouldn‚Äôt try the great food of Cape Coral, but with a full kitchen you can alternate days and thus have more budget to spend on enjoying the events and attractions in Cape Coral! Authentic Local Experiences Staying in a vacation rental immerses you in the local community. You‚Äôll get a taste of what it‚Äôs like to live in Cape Coral, experiencing neighborhoods, local shops, and hidden gems that you might miss when staying in a tourist-centric hotel. This authentic experience adds depth to your trip, making it more exciting and memorable. Flexibility and Freedom Experience the flexibility and freedom of coming and going as you please. Cook your meals, sleep-in, and enjoy a more relaxed, personal schedule. There are no strict check-in or check-out times, and you have the freedom to enjoy your space as if it were your own home. Enjoy the Events with Cape Coral 4 Vacation! When your plans take you to any of the exciting events in Cape Coral, FL, don‚Äôt just settle for any old place to stay. Choose a vacation rental with Cape Coral 4 Vacation ! Attend the events with confidence, knowing that you have a safe, secure and comfortable place to return to after a day full of events! Check out the selection of options and choose the one that looks like a great fit for you. You don‚Äôt want to miss out on staying in a luxury vacation rental that comes with spacious interiors, private amenities, a personalized touch, and a prime location. Take your Cape Coral trip to a whole new level of fun at your Cape Coral vacation rental. Contact the team at Cape Coral 4 Vacation. We‚Äôll help you make your Cape Coral event trip truly special! Pack your bags, bring your sense of adventure and reach out to Cape Coral 4 Vacation to choose the Cape Coral vacation rental of your dreams right now.
